title: Search Advertising Ad Group
description: Search Advertising Ad Group contains common Search Advertising Attributes with custom fields specific to Ad Group setup on the Search Advertising Platforms.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Campaign Internal ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Identifier indicates which Campaign the Ad Group belongs to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Bid Level
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Determines the bid for all ads belonging tho this Ad Group.
